wikipedia_page.main: Victor Charles Matthews (born 23 June 1934) is a British hurdler and decathlete. He competed in the men's 110 metres hurdles at the 1960 Summer Olympics.He also represented England in the 120 yards hurdles at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. He was the 1956 National decathlon champion.
